text: It may sound strange, but summer is actually the perfect time to go matte with your makeup. Since your skin is at its dewiest, a more matte finish can look really chic. The only problem : Without the proper techniques, matte lipstick can sometimes appear more dated than modern. And that's not cute. Not sure how to get it just right? Follow these easy steps : 1. Exfoliate your lips. Dry, dead skin is often what makes your lipstick look rough and uneven, so slough it off before you apply any color.
